name: WonderfulWife
0:
”Alexa, open wonderful wife”
”Alexa, start wonderful wife”
”Alexa, launch wonderful wife”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wonderful wife
des:
This skill will provide husbands with all of the compliments, words of comfort and encouragement that they are looking from their wives.

These are the available compliments;
One ; I only want you
Two ; I admire your integrity and I know others do too
Three; Your honesty and integrity help me feel secure in our relationship
Four; I am so proud of who you are
Five; I am praying for you today. You’ve got this!
Six; I will always stand by your side
Seven; When you listened to me, you made me feel loved
Eight; Every day my love grows greater and deeper for you
Nine; You bring out the best in me
Ten; Together we can win because we make a great team
Eleven; You are a wonderful provider and an important role in this family
Twelve; You are the perfect man for me
Thirteen; Thanks for being a great husband!
Fourteen; I don’t know what I would do without you
Fifteen; My favorite place to be is with you
Sixteen; Life is more interesting with you by my side
Seventeen; Being your wife is an honor
Eighteen; I can face anything with you by my side
Nineteen; I don’t deserve you . . . but, I’m glad you’re mine
Twenty; No matter what, we will get through this together
Twenty One; I want to grow old with you
Twenty Two; I know you strive to please me . . . and believe me, you did great

The skill currently has twenty two encouraging words. To invoke any of the words just mention the corresponding numbers.

Enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
